simulated_ratings.title: Death in Venice (Morte a Venezia) (1971)
simulated_ratings.feeling: Gorgeous yet chilly, I admired more than loved it.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Gritty compassion that pulled me in despite its bleakness.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Gentle satire with delightful visual wit.

simulated_ratings.feeling: Mesmerizing drift with a sharp colonial sting.

simulated_ratings.title: Dersu Uzala (1975)

simulated_ratings.feeling: Detached and precise
